option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<!-- Top Row: Profile Image + Info --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:spacing="10dp">
<!-- Profile Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/applicant_image" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:src="@drawable/applicant" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="Profile" android:layout_marginEnd="10dp" />
<!-- Text Content Column --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Name + New Badge Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:spacing="6dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/applicant_name" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Name" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/new_badge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="New" android:textSize="8sp" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/chip_blue" app:chipStrokeColor="@color/chip_blue" app:chipStrokeWidth="0dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/applicant_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Title" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" android:layout_marginTop="3dp" />
<!-- Applied Date --> <TextView android:id="@+id/applied_date" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Applied on..." android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" android:layout_marginTop="3dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Chevron Icon --> <ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_right" android:contentDescription="Details" android:tint="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<Space android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="10dp" />
<!-- Bottom Row: Favorite + Interview --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="end" android:spacing="8dp">
<!-- Favorite Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/favorite_btn" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_star" android:contentDescription="Favorite" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:tint="@android:color/darker_gray" android:scaleType="centerInside" />
<!-- Interview Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/interview_btn" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="Interview" android:textSize="11sp" app:cornerRadius="6dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/button_blue" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="176dp" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" android:gravity="bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark">
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:text="@string/app_name" android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Body1" />
<<<<<<< HEAD </LinearLayout> ======= </LinearLayout> >>>>>>> ec21f083252e7d41b44c18fede25ebba39f95e35

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="176dp" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" android:gravity="bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark">
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:text="@string/app_name" android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Body1" />
</LinearLayout>

======= <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> >>>>>>> ec21f083252e7d41b44c18fede25ebba39f95e35 <group android:checkableBehavior="single"> <item android:id="@+id/nav_home" android:icon="@drawable/ic_home" <<<<<<< HEAD android:title="@string/find_job" /> ======= android:title="Find Job" /> >>>>>>> ec21f083252e7d41b44c18fede25ebba39f95e35 <item android:id="@+id/nav_profile" android:icon="@drawable/ic_profile" android:title="@string/profile" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_cv_correction" android:icon="@drawable/ic_cv" <<<<<<< HEAD android:title="@string/correct_cv" /> ======= android:title="@string/cv_correction" /> >>>>>>> ec21f083252e7d41b44c18fede25ebba39f95e35 </group>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" tools:showIn="navigation_view">
<group android:checkableBehavior="single"> <item android:id="@+id/nav_home" android:icon="@drawable/ic_home" android:title="@string/find_job" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_profile" android:icon="@drawable/ic_profile" android:title="@string/profile" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_cv_correction" android:icon="@drawable/ic_cv" android:title="@string/correct_cv" /> </group>
<item android:title="@string/account"> <menu> <item android:id="@+id/nav_logout" android:icon="@drawable/ic_logout" android:title="@string/log_out" /> </menu> </item>
</menu>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <string name="app_name">Jobify</string>
<!-- General --> <string name="menu">Menu</string> <string name="posts">Posts</string> <string name="cv_correction">CV Correction</string> <string name="todo">TODO</string> <string name="tod">TODO</string> <string name="todo1">TODO</string> <string name="todo2">TODO</string> <string name="todo4">TODO</string> <string name="todo6">TODO</string> <string name="remove">Remove</string>
<!-- CV Correction Screen (Original) --> <string name="upload_your_cv_and_get_ai_powered_suggestions">Upload your CV and get AI-powered suggestions to improve it.</string> <string name="analyze_cv">Analyze CV</string>
<!-- Candidate Profile Screen --> <string name="meriem_bejaoui">Meriem Bejaoui</string> <string name="tunisia">Tunisia</string> <string name="applied_n12">Applied\n12</string> <string name="reviewed_n8">Reviewed\n8</string> <string name="interview_n3">Interview\n3</string> <string name="a_motivated_android_developer_seeking_new_challenges">A motivated Android developer seeking new challenges.</string> <string name="experiences">Experiences</string> <string name="add_experience">Add Experience</string> <string name="no_experiences_added_yet">No experiences added yet.</string> <string name="educations">Educations</string> <string name="add_education">Add Education</string> <string name="no_educations_added_yet">No educations added yet.</string> <string name="skills">Skills</string> <string name="no_skills_added_yet">No skills added yet.</string> <string name="languages">Languages</string> <string name="no_languages_added_yet">No languages added yet.</string>
<!-- Add Education Dialog --> <string name="add_edu">Add Education</string> <string name="university">University</string> <string name="degree">Degree</string> <string name="field_of_study">Field of Study</string> <string name="startDate">Start Date</string> <string name="enddate">End Date</string> <<<<<<< HEAD <string name="add_ed">Add Education</string> <string name="add_item">Add Item</string> <string name="enter_here">Enter here</string> <string name="add">Add</string> <string name="add_skill">Add Skill</string> <string name="enter_skill">Enter skill</string> <string name="save">Save</string> <string name="menu">Menu</string> <string name="your_platform_for_connecting_talent_with_opportunity">Your platform for connecting talent with opportunity</string> <string name="posts">Posts</string> <string name="find_job">Find Job</string> </resources> ======= <string name="add_ed">Add</string>
<!-- Add Experience Dialog --> <string name="add_expe">Add Experience</string> <string name="job_position">Job Position</string> <string name="company_name">Company Name</string> <string name="company_address">Company Address</string> <string name="start_date">Start Date</string> <string name="end_date">End Date</string> <string name="add_exp">Add</string>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <string name="main">Main</string> <string name="home_icon">Home Icon</string> <string name="find_job">Find job</string> <string name="profile_icon">Profile Icon</string> <string name="profile">Profile</string> <string name="account">Account</string> <string name="logout_icon">Logout Icon</string> <string name="log_out">Log out</string> <string name="dark_mode_icon">Dark Mode Icon</string> <string name="dark_mode">Dark Mode</string> <string name="support">Support</string> <string name="help_icon">Help Icon</string> <string name="help">Help</string> <string name="ai">AI</string> <string name="correct_cv_icon">Correct CV Icon</string> <string name="correct_cv">Correct CV</string> <string name="interview_training_icon">Interview Training Icon</string> <string name="interview_training">Interview Training</string> <string name="job_market_analyse_icon">Job Market Analyse Icon</string> <string name="job_market_analyse">Job Market Analyse</string>
<!-- ========================= --> <!-- CV Correction (New Design) --> <!-- ========================= -->
<!-- Header --> <string name="cv_correction_title">CV Correction</string> <string name="cv_correction_subtitle">Upload your CV and get AI-powered suggestions to improve it</string>
<!-- Upload Section --> <string name="upload_your_cv">Upload Your CV</string> <string name="file_selected">File selected</string> <string name="unknown_file">Unknown File</string>
<!-- Results Section --> <string name="profile_summary_title">Your Profile Summary</string> <string name="review_recommendations">CV Review & Recommendations</string> <string name="cv_analysis_summary">CV Analysis Summary</string> <string name="no_professional_summary">No professional summary provided.</string> <string name="not_provided_label">Not provided</string> <string name="experience_count">Experience: 0 positions</string> <string name="assessment_placeholder">Overall assessment will appear here.</string> <string name="key_strengths">Key Strengths</string> <string name="areas_improvement">Areas for Improvement</string> <string name="no_suggestions">No suggestions available.</string>
<!-- Error Messages --> <string name="analysis_error_title">Analysis Error</string> <string name="error_extract_text">Could not extract text from PDF. The file might be empty or corrupt.</string> <string name="error_parse_response">Failed to parse AI response.</string> <string name="error_ai_generic">Failed to get analysis from AI service.</string> <string name="error_unexpected">An unexpected error occurred.</string>
<!-- Misc --> <string name="toggle_theme">Toggle theme</string>
</resources> >>>>>>> ec21f083252e7d41b44c18fede25ebba39f95e35

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <string name="app_name">Jobify</string>
<!-- General --> <string name="menu">Menu</string> <string name="posts">Posts</string> <string name="cv_correction">CV Correction</string> <string name="todo">TODO</string> <string name="tod">TODO</string> <string name="todo1">TODO</string> <string name="todo2">TODO</string> <string name="todo4">TODO</string> <string name="todo6">TODO</string> <string name="remove">Remove</string>
<!-- CV Correction Screen (Original) --> <string name="upload_your_cv_and_get_ai_powered_suggestions">Upload your CV and get AI-powered suggestions to improve it.</string> <string name="analyze_cv">Analyze CV</string>
<!-- Candidate Profile Screen --> <string name="meriem_bejaoui">Meriem Bejaoui</string> <string name="tunisia">Tunisia</string> <string name="applied_n12">Applied\n12</string> <string name="reviewed_n8">Reviewed\n8</string> <string name="interview_n3">Interview\n3</string> <string name="a_motivated_android_developer_seeking_new_challenges">A motivated Android developer seeking new challenges.</string> <string name="experiences">Experiences</string> <string name="add_experience">Add Experience</string> <string name="no_experiences_added_yet">No experiences added yet.</string> <string name="educations">Educations</string> <string name="add_education">Add Education</string> <string name="no_educations_added_yet">No educations added yet.</string> <string name="skills">Skills</string> <string name="no_skills_added_yet">No skills added yet.</string> <string name="languages">Languages</string> <string name="no_languages_added_yet">No languages added yet.</string>
<!-- Add Education Dialog --> <string name="add_edu">Add Education</string> <string name="university">University</string> <string name="degree">Degree</string> <string name="field_of_study">Field of Study</string> <string name="startDate">Start Date</string> <string name="enddate">End Date</string> <string name="add_ed">Add</string> <string name="add_item">Add Item</string> <string name="enter_here">Enter here</string> <string name="add">Add</string> <string name="add_skill">Add Skill</string> <string name="enter_skill">Enter skill</string> <string name="save">Save</string> <string name="your_platform_for_connecting_talent_with_opportunity">Your platform for connecting talent with opportunity</string>
<!-- Add Experience Dialog --> <string name="add_expe">Add Experience</string> <string name="job_position">Job Position</string> <string name="company_name">Company Name</string> <string name="company_address">Company Address</string> <string name="start_date">Start Date</string> <string name="end_date">End Date</string> <string name="add_exp">Add</string>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <string name="main">Main</string> <string name="home_icon">Home Icon</string> <string name="find_job">Find job</string> <string name="profile_icon">Profile Icon</string> <string name="profile">Profile</string> <string name="account">Account</string> <string name="logout_icon">Logout Icon</string> <string name="log_out">Log out</string> <string name="dark_mode_icon">Dark Mode Icon</string> <string name="dark_mode">Dark Mode</string> <string name="support">Support</string> <string name="help_icon">Help Icon</string> <string name="help">Help</string> <string name="ai">AI</string> <string name="correct_cv_icon">Correct CV Icon</string> <string name="correct_cv">Correct CV</string> <string name="interview_training_icon">Interview Training Icon</string> <string name="interview_training">Interview Training</string> <string name="job_market_analyse_icon">Job Market Analyse Icon</string> <string name="job_market_analyse">Job Market Analyse</string>
<!-- ========================= --> <!-- CV Correction (New Design) --> <!-- ========================= -->
<!-- Header --> <string name="cv_correction_title">CV Correction</string> <string name="cv_correction_subtitle">Upload your CV and get AI-powered suggestions to improve it</string>
<!-- Upload Section --> <string name="upload_your_cv">Upload Your CV</string> <string name="file_selected">File selected</string> <string name="unknown_file">Unknown File</string>
<!-- Results Section --> <string name="profile_summary_title">Your Profile Summary</string> <string name="review_recommendations">CV Review & Recommendations</string> <string name="cv_analysis_summary">CV Analysis Summary</string> <string name="no_professional_summary">No professional summary provided.</string> <string name="not_provided_label">Not provided</string> <string name="experience_count">Experience: 0 positions</string> <string name="assessment_placeholder">Overall assessment will appear here.</string> <string name="key_strengths">Key Strengths</string> <string name="areas_improvement">Areas for Improvement</string> <string name="no_suggestions">No suggestions available.</string>
<!-- Error Messages --> <string name="analysis_error_title">Analysis Error</string> <string name="error_extract_text">Could not extract text from PDF. The file might be empty or corrupt.</string> <string name="error_parse_response">Failed to parse AI response.</string> <string name="error_ai_generic">Failed to get analysis from AI service.</string> <string name="error_unexpected">An unexpected error occurred.</string>
<!-- Misc --> <string name="toggle_theme">Toggle theme</string>
</resources>

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
